name: imo.im hide, SFW 1.2
description:
Makes imo.im difficult to see except for up close. Perfect for the workplace! Darkens slightly on hover for improved hiding.

2010-08-23
-Cleaned up code
-Removed the top toolbar (if you want to show any of the toolbars or footer, just delete them as you see fit from the line containing "div.im_actions, div#imofooter, .toolbar")

2010-08-16
-Removed bottom footer
-Cleaned up some overlapping window colors
-Brought back images/icons (more clearly viewable on hover)
